item.description:
The Best Weekend of Your Life

**For this weekend we are only accepting RSVP's for a 2 night stay**

Join us for a fun filled weekend of skiing, snowboarding, racing, and events during the "13 Hours of EISCL". It's a weekend which always proves to be among the best in the White Mountain Valley.  Be sure to sign up early since this sells out quickly every year.

We welcome new and returning guests to the Brettl-Hupfers. It's a great chance to meet and socialize with our members and guests, visit our club ski house, and enjoy everything the White Mountain Valley offers.

Highlights:

  • Saturday Ski Tickets at Bretton Woods for just $25.00 (as a guest of the house)
  • Evening Events
  • Catered dinner at the Brettl-Hupfers club ski house
  • First time guests get $10 guest lodge fees per night (1/2 price)

And for those hardcore winter fans, our club is about 2 miles from Attitash and close to Wildcat, Cranmore, and Black Mountain. Feel free to ski on Friday or finish off the weekend at one of the local resorts.

More the shopping type? Don't forget that North Conway is down the road offering hundreds of shopping destinations and outlets. Get your ski on - Get your shop on! 

Once you RSVP full directions and information will follow. Members and guests must be 21+
item.name: The Best Weekend of Your Life, Dec 9-11
